description: building decorated with drama/tragedy masks; 2 men (one on crutches with amputated leg) and one woman stand on porch, while little girl stands on platform next to steps, taking an object offered to her by a woman on the sidewalk, who wears a houndstooth coat with beads on her arm; another woman with beads on the first woman's PL side; 2 waving women at left
title: [group of people in front of a building]
